meanings.definition: The sound made by the hooves of a horse or other hoofed animal striking the ground.
meanings.sent1: The rhythmic hoofbeats echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the distant hoofbeats of the approaching horses.
meanings.sent3: The hoofbeats sounded like a drumline marching in perfect sync.
meanings.sent4: As the storm approached, the hoofbeats of raindrops intensified on the roof.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence was broken only by the haunting hoofbeats in the night.
